mapper.select: select b.bookingNo bookingNo, b.hostNo hostNo, b.usersNo userNo, b.bookingDate bookingDate, b.review review, u.name hostName, u.path path, h.adress1 adress1, h.adress3 adress3, h.x x, h.y x, c.rp reviewPoint, c.pp puppyPoint, c.clean clean, c.walk walk, c.play play, c.food food, c.communication communication from booking b, users u, host h, (select count(review) rp, ((avg(clean) + avg(walk) + avg(play) + avg(food) + avg(communication))/5) pp, avg(clean) clean, avg(walk) walk, avg(play) play, avg(food) food, avg(communication) communication from booking ) c where b.usersNo = u.usersNo and b.hostNo = h.hostNo
